summary: Adds a few bat files that allow the player to select which skills to max.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a few bat files that allow the player to select which skills to max. 
Extract all .txt files to your Skyrim game directory. Launch Skyrim and press the tilde key. ~

Type in bat (selected skill). For example \"Bat Archery\".  
Alchemy, Alteration, Archery, Block, Conjuration, Destruction, Enchanting, HeavyArmor, Illusion, LightArmor, Lockpicking, Onehanded, Pickpocket, Restoration, Smithing, Sneak, Speechcraft, Twohanded.
author: Wastelander47
